statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' OR last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT order_id, user_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;
SELECT users.username, orders.total_amount FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 500 ORDER BY orders.total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'johndoe';
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM order_history WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE account_id > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM order_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 5;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM order_history WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM account WHERE balance > 5000;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM order WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, oi.quantity, oi.product_name, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM `order` o JOIN order_item oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN customer c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE oi.unit_price > 10 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, COUNT(o.order_id) AS order_count FROM customer c LEFT JOIN `order` o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id GROUP BY c.first_name, c.last_name HAVING order_count > 1;
SELECT a.account_id, a.account_type, a.balance, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM account a JOIN customer c ON a.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE a.balance > 1000 ORDER BY a.balance DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, address_line, city, state, postal_code FROM customer_data JOIN shipping_address ON customer_data.customer_id = shipping_address.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customer_data JOIN order_history ON customer_data.customer_id = order_history.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM order_history ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, city, postal_code FROM customer_data JOIN shipping_address ON customer_data.customer_id = shipping_address.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
